title: Linley Henzell
data:
'''Linley Henzell''' is an Australian programmer and the author of several open source games, such as ''Captain Pork's World of Violence'', ''Captain Pork's Revenge'' and ''[[Linley's Dungeon Crawl]]''.

== Links ==

* [http://users.olis.net.au/zel/ Website for the Captain Pork games]
* [http://www.dungeoncrawl.org/ Website for Linley's Dungeon Crawl]
